greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of n-th composite number.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: DivisorSigma[1,#]&/@(Select[Range[100],CompositeQ]) (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 10 2019 *)
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = forcomposite(c=1, nn, print1(sigma(c), ", ")); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 21 2016
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 22 2002
